plot: Marleau's sweet vacation in Guadaloupe gets interrupted when she's called to help the local police.

The slave tree: Marleau is holidaying in Guadeloupe, a chance to catch up with an old friend, Loïc. Her peace and quiet doesn't last long when a musician is murdered in a club. Lending the local police a hand, she takes a close interest in the last people to see the victim alive.—TV5Monde Europe
